languages.text: "Раны неглубокие — враг не желал оборвать нить. Но каждая уязвила нерв, чтобы погрузить жертву в бездну агонии. Каждый надрез — послание, но не для наших глаз, а для того, чье тело стало пергаментом". {n}Кибелла морщится.{/n} "Послание, написанное нечистой речью".

"His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."
languages.original_text: "Раны неглубокие — враг не желал оборвать нить. Но каждая уязвила нерв, чтобы погрузить жертву в бездну агонии. Каждый надрез — послание, но не для наших глаз, а для того, чье тело стало пергаментом". {n}Кибелла морщится.{/n} "Послание, написанное нечистой речью".

traits.locale_text: "His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah winces.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

"His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah winces.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

"His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

languages.text: «Sus heridas no son profundas: su atacante no quería cortar su hilo. Sin embargo, cada herida llega al nervio, sumiendo a la víctima en la agonía. Cada corte es un mensaje, no para nosotros sino para aquel cuyo cuerpo hace de pergamino». {n}Kibellah tuerce el gesto, asqueada.{/n} «Es un mensaje impío».
languages.original_text: "His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

traits.locale_text: «Sus heridas no son profundas: su atacante no quería cortar su hilo. Sin embargo, cada herida llega al nervio, sumiendo a la víctima en la agonía. Cada corte es un mensaje, no para nosotros sino para aquel cuyo cuerpo hace de pergamino». {n}Kibellah tuerce el gesto, asqueada.{/n} «Es un mensaje impío».

languages.text: 「彼の傷は浅い。敵は糸を切ろうとはしなかった。しかし、傷のひとつひとつが神経に触れ、犠牲者を苦痛のどん底に突き落とす。すべての傷にはメッセージが含まれている。私たちにではなく、体が羊皮紙と化した者への」{n}キベラは嫌悪感を込めて唇を尖らせた。{/n}「汚れた言葉のメッセージ」
languages.original_text: "His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の傷は浅い。敵は糸を切ろうとはしなかった。しかし、傷のひとつひとつが神経に触れ、犠牲者を苦痛のどん底に突き落とす。すべての傷にはメッセージが含まれている。私たちにではなく、体が羊皮紙と化した者への」{n}キベラは嫌悪感を込めて唇を尖らせた。{/n}「汚れた言葉のメッセージ」

languages.text: “他身上的伤口很浅，敌人并没有打算切断他的丝线。然而，每处伤口都触动了神经，着让他陷入了痛苦的深渊。每一刀都是一条信息，这些信息并不是给我们的，而是给那个身体已经变成羊皮纸的人的。”{n}绮贝菈厌恶地翘起了嘴。{/n}“是由不洁的言语写下的信息。”
languages.original_text: "His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

traits.locale_text: “他身上的伤口很浅，敌人并没有打算切断他的丝线。然而，每处伤口都触动了神经，着让他陷入了痛苦的深渊。每一刀都是一条信息，这些信息并不是给我们的，而是给那个身体已经变成羊皮纸的人的。”{n}绮贝菈厌恶地翘起了嘴。{/n}“是由不洁的言语写下的信息。”

languages.text: "Seine Wunden sind oberflächlich – der Gegner wollte seinen Faden nicht durchtrennen. Und dennoch hat jede Wunde einen Nerv getroffen und stürzt das Opfer in Höllenqualen. Jeder Schnitt ist eine Botschaft – nicht für uns, sondern für den, dessen Körper zu einem Blatt Pergament geworden ist." {n}Kibellahs Lippen kräuseln sich in Abscheu.{/n} "Eine Botschaft in unreinen Worten."
languages.original_text: "His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Wunden sind oberflächlich – der Gegner wollte seinen Faden nicht durchtrennen. Und dennoch hat jede Wunde einen Nerv getroffen und stürzt das Opfer in Höllenqualen. Jeder Schnitt ist eine Botschaft – nicht für uns, sondern für den, dessen Körper zu einem Blatt Pergament geworden ist." {n}Kibellahs Lippen kräuseln sich in Abscheu.{/n} "Eine Botschaft in unreinen Worten."

languages.text: « Ses plaies sont superficielles, l'adversaire ne cherchait pas à trancher le fil de ses jours. Pour autant, chaque coup porté a touché un nerf, plongeant ainsi la victime dans les affres de l'agonie. Chaque entaille est un message... pas pour nous, mais pour l'individu dont le corps est devenu une feuille de parchemin. » {n}Kibellah retrousse les lèvres de dégoût.{/n} « Un message empli de propos impurs. »
languages.original_text: "His wounds are shallow — the foe did not want to cut his thread. And yet each wound has touched a nerve, to plunge the victim into a pit of agony. Every cut is a message — not to us, but to the one whose body has become a sheet of parchment." {n}Kibellah's lip curls in disgust.{/n} "A message of unclean words."
